title: Consider Collaboration
text: Think about how integrating Excel with Google Sheets might enhance teamwork.

title: Real-Time Features
text: Consider the benefits of real-time updates when using integrated tools.

title: Advanced Features
text: Remember that Excel offers advanced features that can be useful in integration.

title: Platform Accessibility
text: Think about how integration affects data accessibility across platforms.

hintAnswer: To collaborate in $$real-time$$ with others while using Excel's advanced features
title: Combine Benefits
text: Combining Excel's advanced features with Google Sheets allows for real-time collaboration.
choices: To collaborate in $$real-time$$ with others while using Excel's advanced features
To convert Excel files into Google Sheets format automatically
To use Google Sheets offline without any internet connection
To ensure data is only accessible on one platform
